name: The Gambling Game
description:
Play as King, one of four individuals trapped in a strange experiment with their lives at stake.  As you are forced to gamble with your life, you will have to make difficult choices to either earn the trust of others or betray them for your own benefit.  The Gambling Game features fourteen different endings and is filled with a variety of meaningful decisions for the player to make.  Sometimes choices will be hidden from the player until they have achieved another ending, so it is worth exploring all of the story branches to solve the mysteries and finally achieve the true ending.  Good luck!

Note: If the text is too small to read, try using the fullscreen button to englarge it.
